articles.author: Alison Sider
articles.title: Travel Woes Deepen as Omicron Variant Hits Pilots and Flight Attendants - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: U.S. airlines cancel more flights over holiday weekend; disruptions seen in Europe as well
articles.content: Airlines continued to scrub flights Friday as Covid-19 infections hit pilots and flight attendants, leaving carriers short-staffed to operate busy schedules over the Christmas holiday weekend.Airline… [+7375 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: COVID vaccination hesitancy inspires some of Europe’s most bizarre rules - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Efforts in Europe to encourage vaccine use through certificates proving vaccination, a negative test result or evidence of having had COVID have created a mountain of regulation.
articles.content:
